Using Machine Learning to Predict The CPI of the Future


With the power of modern technology, we can use machine learning to try predicting and understanding how the cost of living, minimum wage, and inflation might waver in the future. For each of the data points, we have presented the projected trajectory, as well as an annual and monthly trend.
One thing to consider is the data we used is pre-COVID.

Minimum Wage


As we can see the predicted minimum wage is not expected to drastically increase, which makes sense looking at the historically slow rate that it has crawled up.

CPI


Here we can see the prediction of what the cost of living will look like going forward. Keeping in mind that the dataset that we used only goes to 2014, we can see that the predicted CPI is fairly accurate in its projection, and we can examine how the trajectory will continue to increase in the future.

Inflation
